text: The area of Okushiri District in Hiyama Subprefecture. is a district consisting of Okushiri Island, administered as part of Hiyama Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 3,708 and a density of 25.93 persons per km². The total area is 142.98 km². ==Towns and villages== *Okushiri Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Okushiri District, Hokkaido
